text: Everything is out there if you know how to find it, and have the patience. I don't and haven't, but that's my problem.
author: Tom Holt

text: Reading a novel in which all characters illustrate patience, hard work, chastity, and delayed gratification could be a pretty dull experience.
author: Thomas Perry

text: I pray they will carry on in spite of that dreadful monster prejudice, and with patience, courage, fortitude and perseverance achieve success for themselves.
author: Major Taylor

text: Americans have less and less patience for the intrusive and divisive moral scolds who thrived in the bubbles of the Clinton and Bush years.
author: Frank Rich

text: I've always been a person with patience, and I don't like to force things.
author: Harry Shum, Jr.
